summary: Changes multiple warrior perks.  Archery, Light/Heavy Armour, One/Two Handed Weapons all made better.  Unarmed and Spellsword perks included.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][u]Archery[/u][/color]
[color=grey][s]Hunter\'s Discipline[/s][/color] Pinning Shots - Chance to paralyze target.
[color=grey][s]Ranger[/s][/color] _________ Hunter\'s Disciplines - Combined arrow recovery and faster movement.
_______________ Bullseye - Now is a chance to instantly kill human and beast targets.

[color=red][u]Light Armour[/u][/color]
Perks no longer require helmet.
[color=grey][s]Matching Set[/s][/color] Slippery Target - Enemy spell effects now only last half duration.

[color=red][u]Heavy Armour[/u][/color]
Perks no longer require helmet.
[color=grey][s]Fists of Steel[/s][/color]  Load-bearing Shoulders - Adds 100 carry capacity.
[color=grey][s]Cushioned[/s][/color] __ Insulated - 15% magic resistance wearing heavy armour.
[color=grey][s]Matching Set[/s][/color] Put Your Weight Into It - Adds chance to stagger with attack.
[color=grey][s]Reflect Blows[/s][/color] Deflect Blows - 10% reduction to incoming damage.

[color=red][u]One Handed[/u][/color]
All perks now work with unarmed attacks.
_________ Hack and Slash - Bladesman combined into it.
_________ Bone Breaker - Now affects unarmed damage.
[color=grey][s]Bladesman[/s][/color] Spellsword - Grants bonuses while wielding a weapon and spell together.

[color=red][u]Two Handed[/u][/color]
___________ Limbsplitter - Deep Wounds combined into it and changed to chance for bonus damage.
[color=grey][s]Deep Wounds[/s][/color] Savagery - Chance to crit with two-handed weapons for up to 3x damage, but take more damage.



Primarily made this for myself and decided to share.  File doesn\'t change base id\'s of perks so if you uninstall you\'ll simply have the original perks.
author: Palderon
